/* [chn.bhmc.dms.cmm.ath.service.dao.RoleMappingDAO.selectUserRoleMappings] */ SELECT T1.ROLE_ID ,T1.ROLE_NM ,T1.ROLE_DETL_CONT ,T2.REF_ID FROM CM_0804T T1 LEFT JOIN CM_0803T T2 ON T1.SYS_CD = T2.SYS_CD AND T1.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID AND T2.REF_TP = 'U' AND T2.REF_ID = #{sRefId} AND T2.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE T1.SYS_CD = #{sSysCd} AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.ROLE_ID NOT IN
#{roleId}
ORDER BY
T1.ROLE_NM ASCDESC T1.ROLE_DETL_CONT ASCDESC
T1.ROLE_NM ASC
T1.ROLE_NM ASC
